description: This file defines Dart classes for representing a loyalty program's data, including loyalty history entries and overall loyalty information, with JSON serialization support.

classes.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry
classes.description: Represents a single entry in the loyalty points history, including date, change amount, and reason.

classes.name: Loyalty
classes.description: Represents the user's loyalty data, including user ID, current points, and history of point changes.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a LoyaltyHistoryEntry instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistoryEntry.toJson
methods.description: Serializes a LoyaltyHistoryEntry instance into a JSON map.

methods.name: Loyalty.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Loyalty instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Loyalty.toJson
methods.description: Serializes a Loyalty instance into a JSON map.
